root.message: The QUALITY_ASSURE field for indicator 5-6-1, translated into all languages

languages.language: UNFPA maintains the global database on SDG 5.6.1. Before including any national data in the global database, UNFPA technical focal points thoroughly assess the survey methodology used to collect SDG 5.6.1 data to determine the level of comparability across countries and over time in a specific country.
